attributes.action: Tackle Mental health and bullying in educational institutions.
attributes.additional_details: Every student should feel empowered and confident to go to school and complete their studies well, to their highest ability. they should not feel sad and downtrodden at school.
attributes.background: Make safe spaces within schools to talk with others going through similar issues. Anonymous talk boxes, to write down their issues on paper and give them necessary support at school.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign some of the petitions we currently have open on both mental health provisions and anti-bullying:

Stop Bullying in Schools by Training All Teachers to spot Bullying & Harassment

Provide additional funding to schools for Y10-13 mental health support.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548678

Fund a national awareness campaign for mental health in schools
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553711

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551591

Make mental health awareness part of the national curriculum at all levels

Fund preventative mental health sessions in schools and workplaces
